question: Which country houses "Chobe National Park"?
explanation: Chobe National Park is located in Botswana. It is Botswana's first and third-largest national park. It has one of the highest concentration of game (Game, otherwise known as the quarry, is any bird hunted for sport or for food. Common Pheasant is an example.) in all of Africa. The original inhabitants of this area are the San/Basarwa Bushmen. This park has also the largest elephant population.
